Get germplasm metadata for a single trial via BrAPI

getGermplasmFromSingleTrial.Rd

Queries the BrAPI /search/germplasm endpoint for a given trial and returns a data frame of germplasm accessions associated with that trial

Usage

getGermplasmFromSingleTrial(study_id, brapiConnection, verbose = F)

Arguments

study_id

A single studyDbId to query germplasm for.

brapiConnection

A BrAPI connection object, typically from BrAPI::createBrAPIConnection(), with a $search() method.

verbose

Logical; if TRUE, print messages about the retrieval process.

Value

A data frame of germplasm metadata for the given trial, with one row per germplasm. Columns include studyDbId, germplasmDbId, germplasmName, and synonym. If no result is found, not sure what happens.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
brapiConn <- BrAPI::createBrAPIConnection("wheat-sandbox.triticeaetoolbox.org", is_breedbase = TRUE)

germ_df <- getGermplasmFromSingleTrial("8128", brapiConn)
germ_df
} # }
